channel.title: Automatically updating files without transfer? (Quick Question)
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm not looking to have it so I can do this with everyone that I send the client+source too, but only for the administrators. Is there anyway that as I update my own files, it automatically updates there files as I update mine? Like setting up a connection between two file systems?
Note: The computers I wish to do this with are NOT over LAN.
Thanks.

item.title: Automatically updating files without transfer? (Quick Question)
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I Vain I:

Of course it’s possible.

Very helpful.

Muroth:

Dropbox

Thanks.

Read full topic
